Name: Anolock
About the game: ・ Notice All characters in this game are over 18. ・ Story The hero of a petty noble who lost his family and servants due to a pandemic will hire three maids with a referral from his friend. Through contact with them, we will recover from the sadness of loss and the suffering of sequelae. ・ Game content This game is a simulation of noble daily life with 3 cute maids. A friend of yours hired these girls to serve you. The time is divided into 4 diferent periods. Maids will take different actions based on the period. When you walk in the mansion, you'll see them doing different works at different places. You could enjoy the day, chatting with the maids , asking them to cook for you. Or you wish to do something dirty like peeking or make sexual request. Your action may trigger erotic event sometimes, like you seak into a maid's bedroom at night. You could make them your lovers and make yourself a harem. ·Control Z Confirm X Cancel / Skip H-scene Esc System Menu * You can let time goes in the system menu, specify the position of the maid, and teleport. ·others Please read 'Guide.pdf' in the folder as a strategy guide. The trial version is up to 1 favorability. (Peeping / bathing / First sex)
